Title: The Residents of Ihgaluk
Description:
The Skumblade threaten our people, but responding with all-out slaughter would be an overreaction.

A more reasonable response to their threat would be to slay some of their tribal leaders. There will be less bloodshed, and they will still respect our perimeter.
ObjectivesText: Slay a Skumblade Brute, a Skumblade Saur-Priest, and a Skumblade Seadragon.
